html:
12.21.20  11:16 pm   Who first inspired you to make the type of content you did? 

      the whole world

12.21.20  10:51 pm   How do you find something you enjoy doing in life, and devote yourself to it, and stay motivated?

      have you considered crying like a baby

12.21.20  9:04 pm   Are the lyrics "shwzshwzshwzshwzshwz" at 0:11 of "at the airport terminal" symbolic of the events at the Siege of Sevastopol

      no, they are symbolic of the sound of an airplane

12.21.20  8:47 pm   Dont know what to write here. Can i write this?

      sure

12.21.20  8:36 pm   r u disappointed cuz jupiter and saturn didnt smash into each other today

      no

12.21.20  7:54 pm   DId you make some cool sounds

      yes but there are still many more yet to be made

12.21.20  7:46 pm   what's one random ancient civilization fact that you know?

      some civilizations are even more ancient than you may have ever dreamed

12.21.20  7:44 pm   What made you want to start music? 

      i don't remember starting, but i'm sure it was music, because music is what makes me continue to want to start music more and more again and again to this day

12.21.20  7:36 pm   Are you a god?

      i thought you were

12.21.20  7:15 pm   i am listening to your music exclusively on an mp3 player. how do you feel about this?

      fine

12.21.20  6:29 pm   Do you practice any sports?

      no, i've mastered all the sports

12.21.20  5:59 pm   Favorite Jaco Pastorius song?

      teen town, not live, only the weather report studio album recording please

12.21.20  5:57 pm   do you ever bang your head on your table/keyboard out of frustration

      yes

12.21.20  5:53 pm   are you an idiot, or are you smart?

     i might have merged the two

     Are you both?

     one can only hope

12.21.20  5:51 pm   what is your favorite type of cheese

      ghost cheese

12.21.20  5:48 pm   What is personality??

      could be you

12.21.20  5:41 pm   bill how do you come up with your ideas like their so creative

      sometimes i try to write down everything in the world. this is a good start, because the world is very creative

12.21.20  4:39 pm   What inspired your weird and wacky way of making songs?

      just trying to get by

12.21.20  4:10 pm   What is music theory to you?

      when someone says that, i'm beginning to think what they actually mean is musical 'literacy', like being able to read, etc..... i don't think they actually mean like a theory of what makes it good -- because the actual theory is bonkers and it's all in your head and all around the world at the same time

12.21.20  3:58 pm   why am i so ugly

      that is due to the strange amounts of beauty you posess

12.21.20  2:56 pm   What instruments do you play? I've noticed guitar, piano/keyboard, bass and drums but was wondering if there was more?

      jeans

12.21.20  1:46 pm   Whats the point of life?

      to upset the previous status quo, of lifelessness

12.21.20  12:51 pm   What is the 17th word of the 3rd minute of your song?

      thanks for asking. it's "still"

12.21.20  11:46 am   what do you do for inspiration when you feel mentally blocked?

      stand on chair,

12.21.20  11:41 am   Are you working on a legendary song?

      i might not know until after

12.21.20  10:50 am   How does one vacation in the middle of the sun?

      you might not know until after

12.21.20  9:33 am   Is Christmas actually a scheme to rob from kangaroos?

     no

     Thanks big fan here.

     you're welcome

12.21.20  8:46 am   i watch your videos almost everyday and i think you're awesome! what inspired you to make music? :)

      music can prove that anything is good

12.21.20  7:18 am   How was that time you met Redfoo?

      didn't happen

12.21.20  6:10 am   What do you think about winter solstice?

      very dark

12.21.20  5:53 am   will you make a new christmas special video for this year?

     i'm going to be working on the NORMAL and AVERAGE sized music video i've been working on

     if you answer this in 2021 or later, what i mean by this year is the year 2020. sorry for the confusion.

12.21.20  4:22 am   How do you come up with such funky chord progressions?  Everything I do sounds flat or generic, and I can't make that funk come out.

      first, you'll want to go ahead and learn how every note sounds, relative to each other

12.21.20  3:05 am   How are you able to take a very mundane topic and transform it into an inspirational song

      turn it loose

12.21.20  2:02 am   I've found myself inhibited by fear at times. Any tips on not being afraid?

      sing songs of joy

12.21.20  1:01 am   Where can I go to learn how to map chords so flawlessly to fluent speak-singing like you do?

      walk all over the earth if possible

12.21.20  12:07 am   Are thoughts real?

      oh that would explain how traumatic they can be

12.20.20  11:04 pm   do you agree that (in terms of music theory) one must learn the rules first before one can know how to break them? 

      you are supposed to make up the rules. they don't even work unless you make them up. If you want, you can borrow other people's rules, but they will not particularly work for you until you have come around and made them up yourself also

12.20.20  10:47 pm   would you make a song about covid?

      i would like to make a song about everything in due time

12.20.20  9:28 pm   i remember reading somewhere that you're self-taught as a musician, and aside from a keyboard you have a bass as well. who/what influences your bass playing style,

     songs,

     and what advice would you give to a budding bass player?

     basically you want to get yourself as soon as possible into a role where you are providing the bass for a song. if you can't get together with other people to play together, (and most people probably can't), just go ahead and take your favorite song recordings and cut out the bass frequencies, and plug your bass into a speaker which DOES have bass frequencies, and play along.
     Examples of speakers with and without bass frequencies, so you know which ones to use for which--
     
     has bass frequencies: bass amp, headphones, home stereo system
     does not have bass frequencies: laptop speaker, phone speaker, tablet speaker, speakers inside your computer monitor

     play the song on the speaker with no bass, and put your bass through a speaker with bass. now you are the bass player

12.20.20  9:09 pm   if our universe itself is infinite, does the multiverse theory become irrelevant because every reality is already present in our infinite universe?

      could be

12.20.20  8:30 pm   Is it Ok to be scared of small things that are seem as stupid to be scared of, ex: bees

      it really depends how scared you are and how stupid the thing is

12.20.20  7:55 pm   is your new video going to be a christmas present

      it should be good for any day of the year

12.20.20  6:30 pm   have you ever just looked at dirt 

      yes, i am looking at it now

12.20.20  6:11 pm   Are you sensitive and in-tune to other peoples thoughts and emotions?

      yes. as a bonus, i sometimes perceive thoughts and emotions that no one actually had

12.20.20  5:48 pm   Do I need music theory to write a song?

     you're gonna get some anyway, when you write it

     I'm a guitarist interested in the hard rock area

12.20.20  5:29 pm   i don't like your songs very much they are too janky 

      that's probably because i'm a jankster

12.20.20  4:20 pm   Q1) How long will be your next song/vid?

     about 4 minutes and 10 seconds

     Q2) Can I make music even though I do not understand sheet music?

     sure

12.20.20  3:18 pm   Your music is great for listening during the winter, when frightening but good changes are occurring that nonetheless require lots of driving around snow covered mountains. Your music has the most specific utility I've ever experienced, at least for me.

      holy smokes you are very friendly

12.20.20  2:14 pm   Do you answer questions seriously, or do you just meme around?

      always seek to create a blend, over the long term

      impossible. it can't be done
